text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 970 in the Refurbished: Alienware 15 Gaming Laptop 15.6-Inch FHD Laptop (Intel Core i7-4720HQ 2.6Ghz, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD + 128GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M 2GB, Windows 10 Home) Grade A is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Refurbished: Alienware 15 Gaming Laptop 15.6-Inch FHD Laptop (Intel Core i7-4720HQ 2.6Ghz, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD + 128GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M 2GB, Windows 10 Home) Grade A is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 970 in the Refurbished: Alienware 15 Gaming Laptop 15.6-Inch FHD Laptop (Intel Core i7-4720HQ 2.6Ghz, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD + 128GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M 2GB, Windows 10 Home) Grade A is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Starfield. The build quality of the Refurbished: Alienware 15 Gaming Laptop 15.6-Inch FHD Laptop (Intel Core i7-4720HQ 2.6Ghz, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD + 128GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M 2GB, Windows 10 Home) Grade A is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Valorant. The build quality of the Refurbished: Alienware 15 Gaming Laptop 15.6-Inch FHD Laptop (Intel Core i7-4720HQ 2.6Ghz, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD + 128GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M 2GB, Windows 10 Home) Grade A is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
